video.title: Poppy Cat
video.synopsis: This animated series based on the popular children's books follows the adventures of Poppy Cat, whose lively imagination helps her solve any problem.

episodes.synopsis: When Poppy takes everyone to find treasure, a pirate interrupts them. / Poppy takes her friends on a hot air balloon, but Mo is afraid of heights.
episodes.title: Buried Treasure / Cheese Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Alma has a dream in which Zuzu was a space monster. / When Mo's keys fall into the pond, Poppy takes the gang on a submarine voyage to look for them.
episodes.title: Space Monsters / Missing Keys

episodes.synopsis: When Owl finds a baby turtle, the friends try to find its mother. / After Mo lets go of his balloon, the gang takes to the skies in Poppy's airplane.
episodes.title: Runaway Turtle / Lost Balloon

episodes.synopsis: After an episode of his favorite TV show, Mo writes a letter to his hero, Rocket Cat. / Alma has crafted a necklace to give to the pink dolphin.
episodes.title: Dear Rocket-Cat / Dolphin Dreams

episodes.synopsis: The gang is off to Pickle Springs for a cure to Mo's hiccups. / When Owl's nest is destroyed, Poppy takes the gang to find leaves for a new one.
episodes.title: Pickle Springs / Going Coconuts

episodes.synopsis: When Alma's perfume spills, Poppy searches for the Giant Lily to make some new perfume. / Alma shows up with a toad who is late for a royal wedding.
episodes.title: Flower Power / Royal Toad

episodes.synopsis: Zuzu is disappointed when his new cricket does not sing. / When an unusual leaf blows in their path, Poppy and friends go to the forest to see more.
episodes.title: Tricky Cricket / Trumpet Trees

episodes.synopsis: Poppy takes the gang to Chilly Hills, where Mo finds a stowaway polar bear cub. / A power cut occurs while Poppy and pals are watching "Rocket Cat."
episodes.title: Chilly Hills / Marshmallow Mines

episodes.synopsis: After a chrysalis hatches a jungle butterfly, Poppy and the gang take it to Flutterby Falls. / The gang takes a melting snowman to the North Pole.
episodes.title: Jungle Butterfly / Snowman Rescue

episodes.synopsis: After Zuzu eats the last of Mo's jelly beans, the gang travels to get new ones. / Poppy suggests a trip in the camper van to Twisty Tree Ridge.
episodes.title: Space Race / Skateboard Star

episodes.synopsis: When Zuzu fails to play guitar well, Owl suggests they search for the "golden guitar." / Alma is missing one rare flower in her collection.
episodes.title: Golden Guitar / Yodel Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Poppy takes off to the moon, where Mo sets up in a playhouse. / Zuzu confesses to Poppy that he's never been camping because he's afraid of the dark.
episodes.title: Moon Museum / Starry Night

episodes.synopsis: The gang finds a gift and looks for its recipient. / When Alma's seashell does not yield the sound of the ocean, the pals sets out to find another.
episodes.title: Mystery Gift / Rose Cave

episodes.synopsis: When Zuzu learns mountains are named after the person who discovers them, the gang seeks an unnamed mountain. / Alma's cardboard castle is destroyed.
episodes.title: Mount Zuzu / Castle Queen

episodes.synopsis: When Mo loses a pearl from Alma's necklace, the gang dives for a new one. / Poppy misses a shooting star, so her friends look for another with her.
episodes.title: Pearl Hunt / Shooting Star

episodes.synopsis: When Zuzu's skateboard gets bent, Owl suggests he take it to the Skateboard Wizard. / The gang finds an egg and sets out to return it to its mother.
episodes.title: Wise Toad / Bumble Fumble

episodes.synopsis: Alma's new magic beetle fails to grant a wish. / Zuzu's desire to play a form of football called Keepy Uppy leads the gang to fly to the Great Green.
episodes.title: Magic Beetle / Ball Game

episodes.synopsis: When Rocket-Cat is trapped by a robot, the gang flies to save him. / While collecting photos of birds for an art project, Mo finds he is missing one.
episodes.title: Bad Robot / Rare Bird

episodes.synopsis: Alma is performing her umbrella dance when a wind gust whisks away her prop. / Poppy and friends blow bubbles, but Zuzu pouts that bubbles are no fun.
episodes.title: Umbrella Dance / Big Bubbles

episodes.synopsis: The tip of Owl's magic wand falls off after he makes Zuzu's skateboard disappear. / Poppy's friends present her with a birthday treasure map.
episodes.title: Magic Show / Birthday Treasure

episodes.synopsis: When Alma forgets a song she made up, Poppy suggests they go to the Castle of Songs to find it. / The van breaks down in the constant rain.
episodes.title: Cloud Song / Drippy Rainforest

episodes.synopsis: While digging a swimming pool, the gang discovers a piece of tile covered in picture writing. / Mo assumes the role of postman for the day.
episodes.title: Waterfall Lane / Special Delivery

episodes.synopsis: Poppy and her friends go in the submarine to find a sunken treasure. / When Zuzu loses a gift for Poppy, they take off in the rocket ship to find it.
episodes.title: Sunken Ship / Lost Stuff

episodes.synopsis: The gang hears a distress call from Rocket-Cat on Zuzu's Rocket-Cat radio. / Poppy's pals encourage her to be the first cat to fly around the world.
episodes.title: Rocket-Cat Radio / World Record

episodes.synopsis: The gang decides to show Alma's cousin outer space. / When Owl's book goes missing, the gang searches for clues using Mo’s detective kit.
episodes.title: Cousin Alma / Case Closed

episodes.synopsis: Zuzu presents Owl with a homemade waving wooden walrus, but then the walrus mysteriously disappears. / Mo confesses he has never been to a circus.
episodes.title: Welcome Walrus / Forgotten Circus
